creditline:
In memory of Mauricio and Emilia Barragan Lasansky.
From their children:  William Abraham, Rocio Aitana, Leonardo, Maria Jimena, Luis Felipe and Tomás
description: board at top covered in blue fabric with embroidered gold spades on one side and various blue striped fabrics on opposite side; body of various blue striped fabrics with various multicolored printed fabrics (floral, geometric), velvets, and appliques in strips hanging down from top board; some strips trimmed with white buttons or edged with zigzag cut fabrics; some metal discs
medium: Cotton cloth, velvet, metallic threads, wood, metal, plastic
title: Dance costume
